comments.text: Impressive! Though it seems the drag feature could be improved. But overall it looks incredible. You've nailed the design and the responsiveness at various breakpoints works really well.

Woah, your project looks awesome! How long have you been coding for? I'm still new, but I think I want to dive into React as well soon. Perhaps you can give me an insight on where I can learn React? Thanks!
Great work! I haven't got much to add beyond what's already been said, but I just wanted to say congrats! You've done an excellent job on this!
